nodes.text: Commander Juri Marbra was a male Human who was the fiancée of the Twi'lek singer Saahir Ru'luv, as well as a member of the Rebellion. Together, Marbra and Ru'luv ran a gunrunning operations for the Rebellion and on their last mission for the Rebellion before their deaths, they hired Saahir's true love, Thaddeus Ross, and Trep Winterrs to haul a munitions cargo including 500 blaster rifles aboard the Kierra to a hidden Rebel base.
